snippet: A full-floor apartment on the 30th floor of the Heritage at Trump Place on the Upper West Side was the sale of the week.
abstract: Big Ticket column; four-bedroom penthouse on 30th floor of Heritage at Trump Place on Upper West Side, is highest residential sale of week in New York City, closing at $15,500,000.
lead_paragraph: A full-floor apartment on the 30th floor of the Heritage at Trump Place on the Upper West Side was the sale of the week.

headline.main: River and Park Vistas for $15.5 Million
